text: Saint-Donat-sur-l'Herbasse is a commune. It is in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Drôme department in southeast France. == Twin towns == Saint-Donat- sur-l'Herbasse is twinned with: * Oulx, Italy, since 1988 * Ottobeuren, Germany, since 1994 == References == Category:Communes in Drôme
title: Saint-Donat-sur-l'Herbasse
